forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 19C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny to start, then a few afternoon clouds. High 67F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 51F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 12C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening then becoming cloudy with periods of rain after midnight. Low 8C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.
